00036 uvm_resource_pool::uvm_resource_pool()
00037 {
00038 }

00040 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 //
00043 uvm_resource_pool::~uvm_resource_pool()
00044 {
00045     std::map<std::string, resource_q*>::iterator it;
00046 
00047 
00048     for (it = m_resource_q_map.begin(); it != m_resource_q_map.end(); it++)
00049     {
00050         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < it->second->size(); i++)
00051         {
00052             if ((*it->second)[i] != NULL)
00053                 delete (*it->second)[i];
00054         }
00055         it->second->clear();
00056     }
00057     m_resource_q_map.clear();
00058 }
00059

00065 uvm_resource_pool* uvm_resource_pool::get()
00066 {
00067     if (m_pool == NULL)
00068         m_pool = new uvm_resource_pool();
00069 
00070     return m_pool;
00071 }

00081 void uvm_resource_pool::set(uvm_resource_base* rsrc, bool override)
00082 {
00083     std::string name   = rsrc->get_name();
00084     resource_q* rsrc_q = NULL;
00085     std::map<std::string, resource_q*>::iterator it_map;
00086     resource_q::iterator it_q;
00087 
00088     it_map = m_resource_q_map.find(name);
00089     if (it_map != m_resource_q_map.end())
00090         rsrc_q = it_map->second;
00091     else
00092         rsrc_q = new resource_q();
00093 
00094     it_q = std::find(rsrc_q->begin(), rsrc_q->end(), rsrc);
00095     if (it_q != rsrc_q->end())
00096         rsrc_q->erase(it_q);
00097 
00098     if (override)
00099         rsrc_q->push_front(rsrc);
00100     else
00101         rsrc_q->push_back(rsrc);
00102 
00103     m_resource_q_map[name] = rsrc_q;
00104 }
00105 
00106 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 
00111 void uvm_resource_pool::set_override(uvm_resource_base* rsrc)
00112 {
00113     set(rsrc, true);
00114 }

00126 uvm_resource_base* uvm_resource_pool::get_by_name(const std::string& scope, const std::string& name, const std::type_info& type_id)
00127 {
00128     resource_q rsrc_q = lookup_name(scope, name, type_id); 
00129     return get_highest_precedence(rsrc_q);    
00130 }

00134 
00142 uvm_resource_base* uvm_resource_pool::get_by_name_regex(const std::string& scope, const std::string& name, const std::type_info& type_id)
00143 {
00144     resource_q rsrc_q = lookup_regex(scope, name, type_id); 
00145     return get_highest_precedence(rsrc_q);    
00146 }

00149 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 
00158 resource_q uvm_resource_pool::lookup_name(const std::string& scope, const std::string& name, const std::type_info& type_id)
00159 {
00160     resource_q *        rsrc_q; 
00161     resource_q          rsrc_result_q; 
00162     uvmsc_boost::smatch what;
00163     uvmsc_boost::regex  re(uvm_glob_to_regex(name));
00164 
00165     std::map<std::string, resource_q*>::iterator it;
00166 
00167     it = m_resource_q_map.find(name);
00168     if (it != m_resource_q_map.end())
00169     {
00170         rsrc_q = it->second;
00171         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < rsrc_q->size(); i++)
00172         {
00173             if ( (*rsrc_q)[i]->match_scope(scope) && (typeid((*rsrc_q)[i]) == type_id) )
00174                 rsrc_result_q.push_back((*rsrc_q)[i]);
00175         }
00176     }
00177 
00178     return rsrc_result_q;
00179 }
00180 
00181 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00183 
00191 resource_q uvm_resource_pool::lookup_regex(const std::string& scope, const std::string& name, const std::type_info& type_id)
00192 {
00193     resource_q          rsrc_q; 
00194     uvmsc_boost::smatch what;
00195     uvmsc_boost::regex  re(uvm_glob_to_regex(name));
00196 
00197     std::map<std::string, resource_q*>::iterator it;
00198 
00199     for (it = m_resource_q_map.begin(); it != m_resource_q_map.end(); it++)
00200     {
00201         int j = 0;
00202         if (uvmsc_boost::regex_match((const std::string) it->first, what, re))
00203         {
00204             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < it->second->size(); i++)
00205             {
00206                 if ( (*it->second)[i]->match_scope(scope) && (((*it->second)[i])->get_value_type_id() == type_id) )
00207                     rsrc_q.push_back((*it->second)[i]);
00208             }
00209         }
00210         j++;
00211     }
00212 
00213     return rsrc_q;
00214 }
00215 
00216 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00218 
00223 resource_q uvm_resource_pool::lookup_scope(const std::string& scope)
00224 {
00225     resource_q   rsrc_result_q; 
00226 
00227     std::map<std::string, resource_q*>::iterator it;
00228     for (it = m_resource_q_map.begin(); it != m_resource_q_map.end(); it++)
00229     {
00230         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < it->second->size(); i++)
00231         {
00232             if ((*it->second)[i]->match_scope(scope))
00233                 rsrc_result_q.push_back((*it->second)[i]);
00234         }
00235     }
00236 
00237     return rsrc_result_q;
00238 }
00239 
00240 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00242 
00247 uvm_resource_base* uvm_resource_pool::get_highest_precedence(resource_q& rsrc_q)
00248 {
00249     uvm_resource_base * rsrc = NULL;
00250     unsigned int precedence;
00251 
00252     if (rsrc_q.size() > 0)
00253     {
00254         precedence = rsrc_q[0]->get_precedence();
00255         rsrc       = rsrc_q[0];
00256         for (unsigned int i = 1; i < rsrc_q.size(); i++)
00257         {
00258             if (rsrc_q[i]->get_precedence() > precedence)
00259             {
00260                 precedence = rsrc_q[i]->get_precedence();
00261                 rsrc       = rsrc_q[i];
00262             }
00263         }
00264     }
00265 
00266     return rsrc;
00267 }
00268 
00269 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00271 
00275 void uvm_resource_pool::sort_by_precedence(resource_q& rsrc_q)
00276 {
00277     std::sort(rsrc_q.begin(), rsrc_q.end(), &uvm_resource_pool::rsrc_prec_compare);
00278 }
00279 
00280 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00282 
00290 bool uvm_resource_pool::rsrc_prec_compare(uvm_resource_base * rsrc1, uvm_resource_base * rsrc2)
00291 {
00292     if (rsrc1 == NULL)
00293         return false;
00294 
00295     if (rsrc2 == NULL)
00296         return true;
00297 
00298     return (rsrc1->get_precedence() > rsrc2->get_precedence()); 
00299 }

00303 
00310 void uvm_resource_pool::set_priority_queue (
00311     uvm_resource_base*       rsrc,
00312     resource_q &             rsrc_q,
00313     uvm_resource_priority_e  priority
00314 )
00315 {
00316     resource_q::iterator it;
00317     it = std::find(rsrc_q.begin(), rsrc_q.end(), rsrc);
00318 
00319     if (it != rsrc_q.end())
00320     {
00321         rsrc_q.erase(it);
00322         if (priority == PRI_HIGH)
00323             rsrc_q.push_front(rsrc);
00324         else
00325             rsrc_q.push_back(rsrc);
00326     }
00327     else
00328     {
00329         SC_REPORT_WARNING(UVM_RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND,"");
00330     }
00331 }
00332 
00333 
00334 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00336 
00341 void uvm_resource_pool::set_priority_name(uvm_resource_base* rsrc, uvm_resource_priority_e priority)
00342 {
00343     resource_q* rsrc_q = NULL;
00344 
00345     rsrc_q = m_resource_q_map[rsrc->get_name()];
00346     if (rsrc_q != NULL)
00347     {
00348         set_priority_queue(rsrc, (*rsrc_q), priority);
00349     }
00350     else
00351     {
00352         SC_REPORT_WARNING(UVM_RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND,"");
00353     }
00354 }
